about_the_game:
This is the free version of Star Farmer: Warlock of the Universe. As a Warlock, fund your expedition to discover rare and powerful flora through your participation in the lucrative profession of star farming. Build the ultimate space farm as you explore the galaxy and stumble onto the mystery of a dead planet. Cultivate exotic plant life, trade your harvests for credits, and customize your runs with unique powers in this roguelite adventure.

Star Farmer: Prologue Features

Star Farmer: Prologue is a part of the full version of the upcoming game, Star Farmer: Warlock of the Universe. It includes:
  • 2 acts from the full version of the game (from a total of 5)
  • Over 100 powers to take advantage of on your runs
  • Cutscenes and story moments covering the early portion of the game
  • 3 unlockable Warlock Powers
  • Herbarium
  • 6 audio logs to collect
  • Full farming gameplay for 6 different plant types
  • A save file that is shared with the full version of the game
  • Collectable furniture for your ship
  • An upgradeable character and ship to a fifth of the power of the maximum in the full version of the game

Harvest the Cosmos

Venture into uncharted territories and gather an array of seeds and rare materials.

Cultivate Your Bounty

Onboard your trusty spaceship, transform your harvested resources into flourishing crops. Create the ultimate interstellar farm.

Warlock Life

On your travels, find rare and powerful flora you can bring back to your den. These plants can then be utilised to give you powerful boons on your runs.

Trade Among the Stars

Encounter wandering traders during your galactic escapades and strike deals to sell your produce for credits.

Decorate Your Ship

Find furniture on your expeditions and bring them back to spice up your farm.

Upgrade Your Cosmic Expedition

Spend your hard-earned credits to enhance yourself and your spaceship.

Unravel the Secrets

Immerse yourself in a story that unravels the mysteries of a long-dead planet. The fate of this forgotten world lies in your hands.

Features

  • Auto-firing weapons
  • Fast runs (under 15 minutes)
  • Over 150 unique powers available to customise your runs
  • Find furniture and cuddly companions on your runs to take back to your ship
  • Expand your farm, recruit drones to aid you in the busy work, and use your profits to increase the power of your character
  • Each run takes you to many different planets, survive waves lasting 20-40 seconds and harvest as much as you can in that time

Wishlist the full game!

name: Star Farmer: Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8+
  • Processor: 2.5GHz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM+
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: In this bullet heaven, farming adventure, play as a powerful Warlock who has a side hustle harvesting plants in space.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Norwegian*
*languages with full audio support
